# macOS VPN DNS Management Project

This project provides automated DNS management for macOS when connecting/disconnecting from work VPN.

## Project Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions (N/A - shell script project)
- [x] Compile the Project (N/A - shell script project)
- [x] Create and Run Task (N/A - uses LaunchAgent)
- [x] Launch the Project (Run install.sh to set up)
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
